Reviews.Title: Next level Camera w/ great accessories
Reviews.Author: D. R.
Reviews.Content: This package deal from Cardinal Camera was great. I looked around alot, wiht the main camera companies,  comparing options and deals and am glad on selecting this one and the company from whihc I purchased. I It provided accessiories I hadnt thought of, and was just as they advertised. It arrived quickly without problems. Still getting use to the camera to be better at taking shots and becoming familiar wiht the settings, but this looks like a great camera that gives the zoom I sought w/o the need to change lenses.

ProductInfo.Features:
35x Zoom Lens (24-840mm Equivalent
12.1MP High Resolution CMOS Sensor
2.7" Wide Vari-Angle LCD Display
1080p Full HD Video with Stereo Sound
High Speed Burst Shooting @ 8fps
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX40 HS Digital Camera 32GB Package 3
